content:
# Erasmus+ Programme – Recruitment 2025/2026-- AGH University Doctoral School 

URL: https://www.sd.agh.edu.pl/en/news/detail?tx_news_pi1%5Baction%5D=detail&tx_news_pi1%5Bcontroller%5D=News&tx_news_pi1%5Bnews%5D=1188&cHash=28de4f52130e47f0d92f659f2c5e7f50
Crawled: 2025-03-19 21:21:57

Erasmus+ Programme – Recruitment 2025/2026 

 07-03-2025 

Dear All,

We would like to invite students and doctoral students to an informational meeting regarding 
the Erasmus+ Programme – recruitment for the academic year 2025/2026.

The meeting will be held 
online on March 13, 2025, at 1:30 PM on the MS Teams platform.

Meeting link: 
https://teams.microsoft.com/l/meetup-join/19%3ameeting_M2NmNGY4YWYtODJiNy00ZmEzLThlN2UtMjNlZTBjMmUxNTNh%40thread.v2/0?context=%7b%22Tid%22%3a%2280b1033f-21e0-4a82-bbc0-f05fdccd3bc8%22%2c%22Oid%22%3a%228424cae1-3462-4106-885b-3d217008f930%22%7d

The event is organized by the University Erasmus+ Coordinator, Prof. Tadeusz Pająk, and the International Exchange Office (CSM).

POSTER with QR code

Back
